comments.comments_text: Goal! Jordan Siebatcheu passes the ball to Sheraldo Becker (Union Berlin) and he fires in a shot from the edge of the box which is deflected. Alexander Schwolow couldn't do anything about it. 1:2.

comments.comments_text: Janik Haberer (Union Berlin) quickly gets to a rebound. He is not worried how far out he is and slams the ball towards the goal. To the amazement of all, it goes all the way into the middle of the goal. He makes it 1:3 with this magnificent strike.

comments.comments_text: Goal! Sheraldo Becker (Union Berlin) picks up the ball from a rebound and from the edge of the box he unleashes a low shot into the middle of the net. Alexander Schwolow is unable to keep the ball out of the net. It's 1:4.

comments.comments_text: GOAL! Sven Michel (Union Berlin) receives the ball after a swift counter attack. Still with some work to do, he weaves his way through the defence to score a wonderful goal from close range to make it 1:5.

comments.comments_text: Goal! Kevin Behrens shows great vision to find Sven Michel (Union Berlin) with a cheeky pass inside the box, and his first-time shot is precise and sails into the top right corner. 1:6.
